labels.description:
Optional labels that can used by InternetGateways.
Keys must be valid qualified names no longer than 63 characters matching the regex /([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9]/,
with an optional RFC1123 DNS subdomain prefix no longer than 253 characters matching the regex /^[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?(\\.[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)*$/ followed by a '/'.
Values must be match the regex /^(([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9])?$/ and be no longer than 63 characters.

scenarioGroups.description: Optional list of ScenarioGroups that can view the resource when deployed

chart.description: The name of an existing chart.

values.description: Values to use with the chart. Must validate against the chart version schema.

parameters.description:
Optional templated parameters to use with the chart.
Go text templates are supported in values, and non-deterministic functions (ex. randAlpha) can be used.
This can be used to inject random data at runtime or provide simple overridable chart values, for example.

advancedNetworking.description: Advanced networking mode allows network interfaces to be assigned to specific pods in the associated chart.

controlNetNicEnabled.description: Whether the control network NIC is enabled. At least 1 interface is required if false

rangeCerts.description: Optional mapping of range certificates names and IDs

rangeDNSRecords.description: Optional mapping of DNS record names of range DNS record IDs

interfaces.description: Ordered list of interfaces to attach to the container

rangeVolumes.description: Optional mapping of volume name of range volume IDs

macAddress.description:
Optional MAC address, if not provided one will be randomly generated.
     NOTE: Containers currently only support MAC addresses with the private prefix of "0A:58".

id.description: Optional unique identifier, only used with advanced networking

mirrorPorts.description: Optional list of network ports to mirror to this interface

rangeNetwork.description: Optional ID of a range network, if not provided the default network will be used

rangeHostNetwork.description: Optional ID of a range host network, only one of rangeIP, rangeAutoIP, rangeNetwork, or rangeHostNetwork should be provided

rangeIP.description: Optional ID of a range IP, only one of rangeIP, rangeAutoIP, rangeNetwork, or rangeHostNetwork should be provided

rangeAutoIP.description: Optional ID of a range auto IP, only one of rangeIP, rangeAutoIP, rangeNetwork, or rangeHostNetwork should be provided

rangeIPName.description: Optional name of the Range IP that is injected into the container helm values

defaultGateway.description: If true, the default gateway of the associated Range IP will be attached to this interface

interfaceIndex.description: Zero-based index of the associated VM or container interface to mirror

containerSpecification.description: ID of the container specification to mirror to the associated network interface

vmSpecification.description: ID of the VM specification to mirror to the associated network interface

parameters.description:
Optional templated parameters to use with the chart.
Go text templates are supported in values, and non-deterministic functions (ex. randAlpha) can be used.
This can be used to inject random data at runtime or provide simple overridable chart values, for example.

bodyType.description: The type of the body being sent. A value of `parent` can be used to reply with the original message type

labels.description:
Labels used to select a ClusterRangeNetwork.
Keys must be valid qualified names no longer than 63 characters matching the regex /([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9]/,
with an optional RFC1123 DNS subdomain prefix no longer than 253 characters matching the regex /^[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?(\\.[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)*$/ followed by a '/'.
Values must be match the regex /^(([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9])?$/ and be no longer than 63 characters.
